ygData.title: This forum is owned by TransFamily of Cl
ygData.description: This forum is owned by TransFamily of Cleveland and offers support, discussions, and news for parents and family of transgendered, transsexual, and intrasexed children. The list is not moderated but subscriptions must be approved by TransFamily. Subscription to the list includes the TransFamily newsletter.
ygData.trailer:
Welcome to TransKidsFamily

TKF Rules and Etiquette:
 
1) All posts to the TKF list and its archives are strictly CONFIDENTIAL
   and may not be shared with others outside this list without express
   permission from the author.  For everyone  ²s safety, Violation may
   lead to expulsion from list membership.
2) Refrain from the use of curse words in your posts.   
3) Responses should always be courteous   ¶ refrain from offensive and
   non-constructive replies.
4) When responding, please change the SUBJECT line of your reply 
   when the subject changes. Also, please remove everything from
   the original email except a small descriptive portion.
5) To eliminate the large volumes of emails, refrain from One-Word or
   One-Line responses; send these directly to the person to whom 
   you are replying.
6) Use off-list communication for all non-trans-related
   conversations.
7) Finally, for familiarity, try to remember to sign your post with 
   your child's name and description;
   example:     Bill, (dad to Jim 17 yr old ftm)


The TKF List-Serve is here to help you on your journey.  Communicating with others who have traveled, or are traveling the same path, eases the loneliness,  provides insight and proves to be an unending source of valuable information.

Read. Share. Enjoy.

This list owned by TransFamily of Cleveland. Please check the TransFamily website at http://www.transfamily.org for more information.  To visit your group on the web, go to  http://groups.yahoo.com/group/TransKidsFamily/
ygData.name: TransKidsFamily
